text:
Osijek is a city in Croatia. As of 2011, 108,048 people lived in the city. It is the fourth largest city in the country.
It is the largest city and the economic and cultural centre of the eastern Croatian region of Slavonia, as well as the administrative center of Osijek-Baranja County. Osijek is on the right bank of the river Drava, upstream of its confluence with the Danube.
